tables.sql: select f.*, c.name as category from film as f left join film_category as fc on fc.film_id = f.film_id left join category as c on c.category_id = fc.category_id

children.name: actors
children.map-table: select a.* from film_actor as fa inner join actor as a on a.actor_id = fa.actor_id where fa.film_id = :parent_id
